meanings.sent1: The botanical garden displayed a variety of plant species.
meanings.sent2: She studied the botanical characteristics of different flowers.
meanings.sent3: The botanical expert could talk to plants and make them grow faster.
meanings.sent4: Her love for botanical artistry bloomed like a beautiful flower.
meanings.sent5: The botanical fragrance filled the air with a refreshing scent.

meanings.definition: A book or other work describing or classifying plants
meanings.sent1: The library had a section dedicated to botanicals and gardening.
meanings.sent2: He referred to the botanical to identify the unknown plant in his backyard.
meanings.sent3: The botanical on the shelf whispered secrets of the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a botanical, cataloging memories like different plant species.
meanings.sent5: The botanical was a treasure trove of knowledge about plant life.
